Research Interests

I'm particularly interested in projects involving:

  • Multi-agent reinforcement learning
  • Heterogeneous robot systems
  • Large language model agents
  • Graph neural networks for coordination
  • Simulation environments for RL

Speaking & Conferences

I regularly speak at conferences and workshops. Recent venues include:

  • ICML 2024 (Montreal, Canada)
  • IROS 2023 (Detroit, USA)
  • NeurIPS 2023 Workshops (New Orleans, USA)
  • AAMAS 2023 (London, UK)

‚è∞ Response Time

I typically respond to emails within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, feel free to reach out on Twitter.

Let's Connect!

Whether you're a fellow researcher, student, or industry professional, I'd love to hear from you. Drop me a line and let's discuss how we can push the boundaries of multi-agent systems together.
